titleStmt.title: Trading spiritualized Or, certain heads, points, or positions, on which tradesmen (and others) may (O that they would!) enlarge in their meditations. By W. Bagshaw. Minister of the gospel.
titleStmt.author: Bagshawe, William, 1628-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst, at the Bible and Threee [sic] Crowns in Cheapside, near Mercers-Chappel,

notesStmt.note: "Trading spiritualized. The second part" has separate title page dated 1695 and separate pagination and register.

"Trading spiritualized. The third part" has separate title page dated 1696 and separate pagination and register. Imprint reads" Lonon [sic], printed for Nevill Symonds, ... and sold by George Conyers".
Reproduction of original in the Congregational Library.
